name: SICK DAY HOME
description:
do you ever miss a time in your life or miss a time you were never in? this is an experimental environment i made. i like to spend time in there.

WASD or arrow keys to move

Left click to zoom in 

Look around with mouse

Spacebar to jump (might teleport you because of some mesh colliders) 

please let me know if you have any issues or suggestions for improvement, or if you encounter any bugs. or i'd love if you just let me know what you think or how you felt playing it.
